wikipedia_page.main: David Malcolm Telling was the founder of MITIE Group, which is now one of the United Kingdom's largest facilities management companies.  Born in Harrow, North London on 12 August 1938 and brought up in Cleeve in Somerset, David Telling was educated at Cheltenham College. He died on 31 October 2003, aged 65.

response: Mitie was founded by David Telling and Ian Stewart as MESL in 1987.MITIE: History  It was first listed on the London Stock Exchange in 1988. It merged with Highgate & Job in 1989 and was renamed the Mitie Group.David Telling: The High and MITIE The Independent, 21 March 2001

*1996: Empresaria plc founded by Miles Hunt with David Telling as Chairman (founder of top 250 UK company, MITIE).  Philosophy to target talented recruitment professionals to own and operate their own autonomous UK businesses.
